preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 20 g of P, 15 g of Sc, 30 g of Si, and 25 g of W using a precise balance. 
 2. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine P and Sc, stirring thoroughly to ensure an even mixture. 
 3. Gradually add Si to the P-Sc mixture while continuously stirring for uniformity. 
 4. Finally, incorporate W into the blend, ensuring all components are homogeneously mixed.
